segments.text: I'm observing the boy on the stool very carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks incredibly unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, almost as if it's about to collapse or tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so high, reaching deeply into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any sudden movement could send him toppling backward onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see him gripping a plate, maybe to catch the cookies or use it as a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him doesn't seem to notice the immediate danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is fixed solely on the prospect of getting a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm literally holding my breath just watching him balance there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels like a disaster waiting for gravity to act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so determined to get those cookies, it's admirable yet terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would secure that stool or help him down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart is pounding a little bit with concern for his safety.
segments.speaker: PAR
